page.title: 06The Afternoon at School.
page.content: After lunch break had finished we all did topic work.I was writing about a speedwell which I found on a walk.We are studying plants growing in the school garden. Afternoon break is at 2.15 until 2.30. After break we did drama in the hall where we acted out bible stories. When we had finished we returned to our classroom then I went to cello lesson with Mrs. Tunnicliffe my cello teacher. School finished at 3.30 when I go home, but today my brother stayed for cross country practice. School meals cost 60 pence a day at our school,that's three pounds a week.Swimming costs us 40 pence a session.
